FuncDef: The display gvrp vlan-operation interface command displays dynamic VLAN information of an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Display dynamic VLAN information of a specific interface:
<ifType> specifies the type of the interface.<ifNum> specifies the number of the interface.
-

Examples: Dynamic VLAN operations on port GigabitEthernet3/0/1
Operations of adding VLAN to TRUNK             : none
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check information about dynamic VLANs that an interface is added to, run the display gvrp vlan-operation command.
